snippet: It would be a mistake to assume that the agreement guarantees a quick or easy path to stability for the country.
abstract: Editorial warns that while both Ukraine and Russia have ample reason to embrace cease-fire agreement, Russian Pres Vladimir Putin's past deceitful conduct undermines chances that agreement will be maintained or lead to stability; says NATO must stick by its promises to defend Ukraine from Russian aggression in order to avoid worsening of crisis.
lead_paragraph: It would be a mistake to assume that the agreement guarantees a quick or easy path to stability for the country.
